duration_in_months: Irrevocable option period(s): Up to 4 years
full_summary:
=================
### Solicitation Number
W8486-249254/A

### Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking the services of Two (2) Intermediate Project Managers in support of Stream 3, Project Management Services. The contractor will be required to provide services on an ongoing basis for an initial two-year contract period, with the option to extend up to four one-year option periods.

### Key Information
* The contract value is estimated to be below $2M.
* A Secret security clearance is required.
* The contract will be awarded under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) number E60ZT-18TSPS.
* Documents must be submitted in either English or French.
* The contractor will be required to comply with Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants.

### Service Delivery
* The services will be delivered in the National Capital Region (NCR), specifically at the NDHQ Carling Campus, 3500 Carling Avenue, Ottawa, Ontario.
* The region of delivery is the same as the region of opportunity.

### Submissions
* Submissions must be received by 2:00 PM EST on 2023-11-21.
* Bidders are advised that the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents are not available on the CanadaBuys Tender Management Application.
* Documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the qualified supply arrangement holders.

### Additional Information
* For further information on the TSPS method of supply, please contact Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).
* Bidders are required to comply with the security requirements outlined in Part 6 of the bid solicitation.
* For more information on the Industrial Security Program (ISP), please visit the website at [](http://ssi-iss.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/index-eng.html).

### Contact Information
* Contracting Authority: Jennifer Ouellet, jennifer.ouellet2@forces.gc.ca, (343) 598-1547.

### Security Clearance
* A Secret security clearance is required for the contractor.
* The security level required is None.
* There are no citizen restrictions.

### Bidder Inquiry
* Bidders are required to submit their inquiries to the Contracting Authority.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.  END ## I reformatted your output into nice markdown format. I also made minor changes to sentence structure, adding phrases
